snippet.title: Sportacus - Lazy Town Pirate Adventure | How to Play
snippet.description:
Lazy Town  online game.
Ziggy Lazy Town Challenge - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ikkxWGkToVU
The aim of this game is to feed your friends on the boat by collecting fish in your barrel. These then need to be dropped onto the ship! Stay away from the shark, he can cause you to drop your fish! Try not to get hit by pies, you will loose points! How to Play Games with Your Favorite Cartoon Characters
